EmailTemplate.name: Media Team push
EmailTemplate.subject: Last places in the media team!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
We Still have a few place left in the media teams! Looking for something to do tomorrow?
Why don't you and your friends come along to the media team launch?
It's taking place in Birmingham and 52 Charlotte Street, B3 1AR from 10am - 4pm. Dominos for lunch and a great time will be had.
You can turn up on the day or call/text Liam on 07785627463 for info on how to get here.
See you tomorrow hopefully!
